title: maxima action:info
description: Returns your Maxima identity, contact address, and MLS configuration.

localidentity.description: Local network identity (Mx...@localIP:PORT). Only reachable on local network.

p2pidentity.description: Public network identity (Mx...@publicIP:PORT). Use for external contacts.

contact.description: Full contact address for sharing with others (Mx...@IP:PORT)

x-agent-warnings: Use p2pidentity for external/public contacts, NOT localidentity
localidentity is only reachable on the local network
contact is the shareable address for adding you as a contact
poll is an INTEGER, not a string
